about_the_game:
If you are a man, or a woman who likes even more explosions and hentai then this DLC is for you!

Purchase the Boom Pow Pack II to gain access to the following:

-3 Doom Blasters (Items capable of clearing a battle in mere seconds).

-2 Erotic Hentai Images (one straight, one gay).

-A cameo; Tolem Felstein from Falnarion Tactics II is included as well!

-Bonus naked anime girl image included too!

So, what are you waiting for? Purchase today!

content_descriptors.notes: This DLC contains images of characters over the age of 18 and should only be viewed by those over the age of consent in their country.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® Vista(sp2) / 7 / 8 / 10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo processor or AMD Athlon™ 64
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display
